channel.title: [PI] If Wearing An Item, It Boosts Exp Rate In Specific Skill [PI]
channel.description:
How do I make it so if someone is wearing a certain item, it boosts exp in a certain skill?
Example: [code]case 13660: (makes 2x firemaking bonus)[/code]
I am guessing this can be added to Firemaking class but I do not know how to make it double exp.

item.title: [PI] If Wearing An Item, It Boosts Exp Rate In Specific Skill [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”] if (c.playerEquipment[TYPE_OF_EQUIPMENT] == ITEM_ID) { c.getPA().addSkillXP(XP_AMOUNT * MULTIPLIER, SKILL_TO_ADD); } else { c.getPA().addSkillXP(XP_AMOUNT, SKILL_TO_ADD); }

TYPE_OF_EQUIPMENT(s):
Weapons: c.playerWeapon
Hats/helms: c.playerHat
Bodies/plates: c.playerChest
Legs/skirts: c.playerLegs
Shields: c.playerShield
Capes: c.playerCape
Arrows/ammo: c.playerArrows
Gloves: c.playerHands
Amulets: c.playerAmulet
Boots: c.playerFeet
Rings: c.playerRing[/quote]
Where do I add that?

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] If Wearing An Item, It Boosts Exp Rate In Specific Skill [PI]

item.title: [PI] If Wearing An Item, It Boosts Exp Rate In Specific Skill [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Logitek Logitek
item.description:
@Logitek wrote:

find where the xp is added and add
if(ItemID == (ID)) {
extra XP added;
}else{
reg ammt of exp added;
}
